name: Fish Broast Burger Recipe | Gulzar Hussain | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Fish Broast Burger Recipe: Buns 3-4 Cheese Square (Slices) 3-4 Eggs 2-3 Chili Garlic Sauce as required Garlic Sauce as required Vegetables as required Oil for frying
instructions: Take 3-4 buns toasted in a tawa pan. Now take as required fish broast , as required chili garlic sauce, 3-4 slices of cheese square , 2-3 eggs and as required vegetables make the filling on a burger and serve it.
